tool_description: Monitors and updates pregnancy status of bred females, tracks breeding dates, and estimates due dates for breeding program management.

male_id.description: ID of the male animal used for breeding

pregnancy_status.description: Current pregnancy status: confirmed, suspected, not_confirmed, or failed

confirmation_date.description: Date when pregnancy status was confirmed

confirmation_method.description: Method used to confirm pregnancy: ultrasound, blood_test, or physical_exam

error_messages: Animal not found: female_id or male_id does not exist in the registry.
Invalid breeding date: Date cannot be in the future and must be in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid pregnancy status: Must be 'confirmed', 'suspected', 'not_confirmed', or 'failed'.
Invalid confirmation method: Must be 'ultrasound', 'blood_test', or 'physical_exam'.
Date inconsistency: confirmation_date cannot be before breeding_date.
Missing confirmation data: confirmation_date required when status is 'confirmed'.
usage: Provide female_id, breeding_date, male_id, and pregnancy_status. Include confirmation_date and confirmation_method when pregnancy is confirmed.

tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for this pregnancy record

estimated_due_date.description: Calculated due date based on species gestation period

days_pregnant.description: Current number of days since breeding

status_confidence.description: Confidence level of pregnancy status: high, medium, or low
